DOC.brief_summary: To reduce modifiable diabetes risk factor ' overweight obese AI men reside Colville reservation community-based , culturally inform intervention , study specifically aim : 1. conduct focus group interview adult member Colville tribe inform adaptation , manualization implementation culturally inform diabetes prevention program among overweight obese AI men ; 2. evaluate effectiveness community-based , culturally inform diabetes prevention intervention assess group change : Primary Outcomes : weight , dietary fat caloric intake , vegetable consumption , physical activity ; Secondary Outcomes : physical fitness , blood pressure , lipid , self-reported quality life ; , 3. evaluate sustainability diabetes prevention intervention assess participant perception program component fit focus group discussion participant intervention telephone interview leave program .
DOC.brief_title: Nxstan : A Culturally Tailored Intervention Prevent Diabetes American Indian Men
